SELECT STU_NO , USER_NM , USER_BRDT , TB_SVLF.SVLF_NM AS SVLF_NM , TB_STU.SVLF_NO AS SVLF_NO
FROM TB_STU JOIN TB_SVLF ON (TB_STU.SVLF_NO = TB_SVLF.SVLF_NO) JOIN TB_SVLF ON (TB_STU.SVLF_NO = TB_SVLF.SVLF_NO) WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT TB_ATTDAN.STU_NO AS STU_NO, c.cd_nm AS ATTDAN_CD, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_DT AS ATTDAN_DT, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_BGNG AS ATTDAN_BGNG, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_DDLB AS ATTDAN_DDLB, TO_CHAR(TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_WRITE_DT, 'yyyymmdd') AS ATTDAN_WRITE_DT, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_APPROVAL AS ATTDAN_APPROVAL, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_CD AS ATTDAN_CD, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_CN AS ATTDAN_CN, TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_NO AS ATTDAN_NO FROM TB_ATTDAN JOIN tb_cm_cd c ON c.cd_type_id = SUBSTR(TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_CD, 1, INSTR(TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_CD, '-') - 1) AND c.cd_vl = SUBSTR(TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_CD, INSTR(TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_CD, '-') + 1) AND c.cd_type_id = 'S003' AND c.cd_c_use_yn = 'Y' WHERE TB_ATTDAN.STU_NO = #{stuNo} ORDER BY TB_ATTDAN.ATTDAN_WRITE_DT DESC
